title: Bug 43281Text field throws StackOverflowError when full
description: Text text = new Text(parent, SWT.MULTI | SWT.WRAP);text.addKeyListener(new KeyAdapter() {public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e) {if (e.keyCode == SWT.CR)text.append("\nOK");}});After entering a few lines, we reach the bottom of the text field, and get thefollowing message:Unhandled exception caught in event loop.Reason:java.lang.StackOverflowErrorIf SWT.VSCROLL is specified in the Text constructor, this problem does notoccur.
